simple.title: Simple
simple.text: We're doing our best so that your experience is the most fluid possible. You know how to drag and drop ? It's enough to use the application !

powerful.title: Powerful
powerful.text: We provide you with a complete set of tools so that you can let your imagination run free and create music !

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.text: Despite all our efforts, you don't find suitable tools ? No problem, you can create your own ones with the provided editor !

paragraphs.welcome: Welcome to synple, the modular synthesis... Simpler !
paragraphs.goal: Here you will find an interface allowing you to edit your own synthesier, with existing modules or, when you'll be more familiar with the system, by creating your own ones !
paragraphs.instructions: Some instructions before letting you experiment :

list: To add new modules, click on the "+" button on the top left.
To create links, drag and drop from an input port (black) to an output port (blue) or the other way around
To modifyy a parameter, you can either click and drag from a knob, or place your cursor on it and use the mouse wheel
You can zoom in or out with the mouse wheel too, and drag and drop the whole synthesier to move inside it
init.title: Synple

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: Delays a signal from a given amount (in seconds)

delayEffect.title: Analog delay
delayEffect.description: An analog delay effect to give some space to your sound.

Envelope.title: Envelope (ADSR)
Envelope.description: A volume control node for it to go up and down mort smoothly when playing.

VCA.title: Voltage-controlled Amplifier (VCA)
VCA.description: Enhances or diminishes the amplitude of a signal.

VCF.title: Voltage-controlled Filter (VCF)
VCF.description: High-pass, Low-pass, notch, peaking, etc. This filter allows the edition of the freqsuencies of a signal.

LFO.title: Low-frequency Oscillator (LFO)
LFO.description: A simple modulation oscillator piloting and automating other parameters.

MidiKeyboard.title: MIDI keyboard input
MidiKeyboard.description: Allows you to use any MIDI keyboard emitting on a channel, or the computer keyboard itself.

noises.title: Colored noises
noises.description: Colored noises allowing you to include some randomness into your patches.

VCO.title: Voltage-controlled Oscillator (VCO)
VCO.description: An oscillator with four available wave forms.

output.title: Audio output
output.description: A simple audio output routing the signal to the speakers.
